features.text: Added the ability to bulk-create child blocks by holding the "ctrl" key.
features.reasoning: Holding the "ctrl" key when creating a new child block will enter "bulk creation" mode. Pressing "enter" after typing in the new block's summary text will immediately create a new block. Pressing the "escape" key, clicking anywhere, or pressing "enter" twice will exit this mode, and automatically select all the newly-created blocks.

bugs.text: Resolved a harmless but sporatic error encountered when dropping blocks at the end of a Kanban list.
Moving a block into the "Uncategorized" column of a Kanban view clears the value instead of displaying an error.

tweaks.text: Added block deletion to the Kanban and Filter views.
tweaks.reasoning: Select the block(s) and press "delete" or "backspace" to delete them.

tweaks.text: Clicking the background of a view clears the current block selection.
View icon in the upper-left can be clicked to close the current view.
tweaks.reasoning: The "Back to Mind Map" button in the bottom-right isn't the most intuitive, so we decided to provide an alternative. The correct icon to click is highlighted in white to make it more identifiable.
